website_summaries.verdict: Classic suede design looks attractive. Appearance makes them a great everyday shoe while design lets them function as an athletic shoe.
pros: Design works well for wide feet
cons: Doesn't work well for those with high arches
Durability has been an issue with this design

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones I used to wear!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of these over 20 years ago and wore them out because they were so comfortable. They feel like you're wearing slippers! Was so happy to be reunited with Pumas.. Wore these yesterday (all day) and my feet were so happy. Thinking I should stock up, in various colors, so I will always have a pair - until the end of my days. Thank you, Puma, for being one of those companies who sticks around and who has blessed the Universe with this fabulous shoe!
customer_reviews.author: TalkingToTrees

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. They are very high quality and fit perfectly. A though the reviews said to order a smaller size I went with my usual size 8. The color of the shoe looks different on multiple websites so I was expecting them to be dark but hoped they would be lighter, and they were lighter. The stripe on the shoe is an off white color, I was expecting it to be bright white. I don't really have any cons about this shoe. I will be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I luv these babies, I'm always looking for show stoppers. And these are definitely it. So many compliments.. I usually wear 8.5 & I ordered an 7.5
customer_reviews.author: LADYLION

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Stylish and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Stylish and adorable, I plant to start building a collection of the colors. If you are between one size and a half size go with the upper. I am usually a 9.5 or 10 and ordered the 10 and they are perfect. Ordered first pair in wine, for fall, will order a brighter color as the season changes to spring..probably a blue or peach.
customer_reviews.author: lachigirl

customer_reviews.title: The toe box was more comfortable in the 8
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual 7.5 and found the toe box was a little narrow. My little toe was rubbing inside, so as some had suggested I ordered up a half size and I got the size 8. The toe box was more comfortable in the 8, although the shoe is a drop big with extra room in the length of toe area. I decided to keep them for casual walking around and they are very comfortable. I got the wine tasting color. They are retro and cute and seem well made. Great price for them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Trishicat

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfortable. When I first got them they were rather narrow and tight on the sides and I wasn't sure if I was going to be able to keep them. But after 2 days of breaking them in they fit perfectly. Im a housekeeper and have been wearing them at work and I've had no foot or back pain. New favorite shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha b.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was perfect, BUT they are narrow
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was perfect, BUT they are narrow. The front gets even more narrow. By the end of the day, my little toes were rubbed raw! Hopefully this is part if the break-in process. They have a fake arch support that's better than nothing, and they are not completely flat on the bottom like Vans. The color is like a coral orange. If you put it next to orange, it looks like faded orange. If they break-in ok, I might get another color!
customer_reviews.author: Greymom

customer_reviews.title: Very cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ok I really like these. This is my second pair of puma sneakers ever. I'm usually a Nike girl but I love the color it's super rich and the fit is awesome very comfortable. The price was right I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneakers!👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6.5 in flat shoes but I normally get size 7 sneakers for comfort. There is no need to go up a size in these sneakers. The 6.5 fits perfectly with plenty of toe room. They're super comfortable and a really good look if you like an old-school style. The color is a bright peach with an off white swoop. I've gotten lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Waters

customer_reviews.title: unsupportive and falls apart
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fell apart quick. They have zero arch support. They looked decent (before they got all torn up with simple, every day use), but they had zero support. My feet would be in pain within about 3hrs of use and I’d never had this issue with shoes before. Total life time was probably about 6months and that’s only because I was fine using them with a hole in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 9, but sometimes an 8.5. My foot is a little wider than a true B, but usually a B is fine. This shoe fit perfectly well and I can wear it without socks which I prefer to do. I love the color! It came with two sets of laces. One set matches the shoe color and the other is white. I haven't worn them for an extended period of time, but they do seem to be comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: GullyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the same pair of Puma sport shoes for at least twenty years. They went to China with me in 1991, Holland and Russia, since then. I didn't realize that Puma had stopped making this model until I went looking for a back-up pair. Five years later, I was still looking. These do the trick. They look nice. They fit well. I don't wear them in the gym. I still wear my oldies.
customer_reviews.author: Indexer Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Sneaker, Great Color
customer_reviews.text: This is only the second Puma Sneaker I've ever had but my first pair lasted years. So I bought these based on my past experience. They fit well and the color is smashing. My only small complaint is that, because my feet often hurt after walking or shopping, I will likely buy a gel insole for a little more comfort. But if you have no problem with aching feet, you'll love these as they are!
customer_reviews.author: Joan E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Trying to find more in different colors is impossible. Get these beauties while you can. They look so good on my feet. I'm a nurse obsessed with matching my shoes with my scrubs and I have gotten so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: TONIA MURRAY

customer_reviews.title: I like the classic look however the color was more coral ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the classic look however the color was more coral than pink and much deeper than I expected. They are wider and therefore looser so they tend to rub and hurt after wearing them for too long - I would not expect to wear them if I had to do a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Helma

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. But the tongues cut right into the front of my ankles because there is no padding on them. Still I like the look of the shoe, they're very attractive, and I will just have to wear more padded socks I guess. Maybe after they are broken in the shape of the tongue will soften up a little.
customer_reviews.author: EZMERELDA JO

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. So comfy and nice. However they are not as "puffy" as they look in the picture. I was expecting closer to an old school skating shoe but these are thin. I was hoping that they would be wider than my ankle in skinny jeans but they are not. Just something to keep in mind. Still very comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: KatieD

customer_reviews.title: shooes are too heavy, no memory form inserts, Noe comfortable,
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, but shoes are heavy and uncomfortable, so I decided to return, sorry about that. can't print the return label, I hope UPS pick will bring the label, when they show up to pick up the returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes a lot, they are very cute. The only problem is they aren't as comfortable as my other pumas, which is odd. Also, the color blue I ordered looked a lot more light/sky blue color, but the shoes I received are a royal blue color? Not sure if I was given the wrong color or if the color just looks deceiving. Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bilodeau

customer_reviews.title: I use to love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use to love these shoes, so comfy. After the first wear they oddly ripped so I returned them and ordered a second pair. The second pair I ordered the stitching on the "swoosh" was undone before I tried the shoes on I can easily pull it off. This is the second time I ordered and no difference in quality. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but the support is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: They look great and feel lousy. I hate to say it, but these shoes are just junk. Also, they are big, so size down a half a size. I wear a 10 ladies, and these feel floppy. I have worn Pumas for years, with a few years of a break, and these are not made like they used to be - quality in the sole is nothing like the ones I used to buy. If you are going to sit all day, then these are probably fine, but if you do any walking or standing while at work, for example, I would suggest getting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Mook Hayes

customer_reviews.title: More stylish. Less functional.
customer_reviews.text: Given that they were on sale and purchased towards the end of the year, I have no real complaints. They are so bright as to be blinding for an old lady like myself, but since I'm young at heart, I can ignore that detail and enjoy my bargain. They are nothing like the Pumas I wore years ago. More colorful and less support.
customer_reviews.author: frankh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ive had pumas In the past, but these are size 10 women's and seem too narrow, so after laces loosened, shoe near ankle too loose. Weird fit, not sure if it's because of the size, but they'r not like i remembered puma's to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jfab2015

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfortable and too big
customer_reviews.text: Have worn those sneakers twice. Too heavy. Too big. Not very comfortable. Hope will become better later :) My first Puma sneaker, and I will not risk buying another pair
customer_reviews.author: Idea Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My normal size can be 7 or 71/2 Normally I go with 71/2 withboits and sneakers. They are very pretty this is my second pair they are water resistant and very confortables to walk . I took my great pair to Portugal and was a pleasure to walk and I have a lot of problems with my feet .
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: This Salmon color is everything!
customer_reviews.text: I love these with all my heart and soul. A true Classic never goes out of style! A must have! I pair these with slacks for the office and everyone always has a nice compliment. I have a closet full of them. Every color! These are my first in the pink/rose/salmon family. I LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Fat_berry

customer_reviews.title: These are not the most comfortable sneaker I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are not the most comfortable sneaker I have ever owned, but I love the color!!! I am sad to say that the material got stained the one and only time that I got to wear them!!! Be warned!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tam Felix

customer_reviews.title: The color of the shoe ordered has to be the color of the shoe in the box
customer_reviews.text: I love these Puma suede shoes. I ordered green with white. The pair in the box were a completely different color. The were peach. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma shoes. When i purchased these shoes i thought they were the same as my previous ones. However the difference is these are suede. I have worn these shoes five or six times. The black of the suede has started to meld into the off white stripe. It is very unappealing! I would think twice about buying suede again because of this. It is very disappointing to wear b.c them as they now look DIRTY.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Love Pumas!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Pumas in three different styles. I love the way these look, and they seem very comfortable, but I've only worn them once so far. The only thing I would mention is that the tongue seems rub the front of my ankle a bit. I'm sure I'll get used to it. I have wide feet, but these seem fin in a medium width.
customer_reviews.author: deborah b

customer_reviews.title: Barbie fan must have!
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute Barbie Pumas. Not too heavy for walking. May initially be a little but will stretch with continued wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Puma girl forever now!
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is the most comfortable brand I have ever worn, and I have a very high arch and narrow foot. Easy fit, can wear them all day, clean well, great support. The color I picked was Parachute Purple/Blue Iris. I thought it would be more navy, but mine are more of an overall Plum shade. My friends have gone crazy over the beauty of these colors, they are unique and go with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: KitjS

customer_reviews.title: Misleading reviews, be careful
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the reviews I had read, this particular shoe runs not small, but a bit large. I wear an 8, without fail, but the reviews suggested a half size up. Unfortunately, I had to return the size 8.5 as they were much too large. I even have a little room in the size 8. Regardless, they are beautiful, and once I get used to a bit of extra room,... they're great!
customer_reviews.author: elle camino

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, comfort is so-so
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cool looking, and I can wear them to work. I wouldn't wear them everyday because they are very flat. I put my expensive insoles in them and it helps a little bit. I usually prefer really good running/walking shoes for all their fit and support. But I wanted something different and cool, and these definitely are!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big but I love them. I wear them almost everyday. I will buy another pair in a different color just to have variety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought the same size and same style different color pumas from footlocker and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe a little darker than I expected and they run kinda big in a size 10 They slide off my feet when i walk. Last time I had to wear two pairs of socks was when my mom was buying my shoes as a child so I won't grow out of them so fast. I bought the same size and same style different color pumas from footlocker and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hunni

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This sneakers were made in Indonesia and I went a size up to a size 10. It fits but inside is hard. I went to a concert wearing these and by the time I left the concert my feet were really hurting. I guess I paid for what I got, cheap price shoes but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mochaleeshus

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: I wear between 8.5-9 and ordered so 9. They were too big and felt "clunky" on my feet. I think the Vikki style is more fitted. The shoes are cute, and although they were too big, they seemed too boxy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tore after 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: such a cute and classic shoe, but the tear pictured is only after 3 days of light wear. i am incredibly disappointed. needless to say, they were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneakers Fit very comfortable Not to flat The green is a shocking color so if you're in to bright sneakers like I am than you'll love them also
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I actually bought a pair in mint and decided to buy a second pair in desert flower. They could use a little more arch support, but that can be quickly rectified with an arch insert. Perfect summer sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Dobergrrl

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and they delivered the next day. I was on my feet for several hours and these were not that supportive but you could easily just add an insole to combat that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashrod88

customer_reviews.title: Bright color. <3
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Wife loves them. However she says he no show socks slide into the shoe too often. I told her wear different socks.
customer_reviews.author: TZR

customer_reviews.title: They look cool but there is ZERO support in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look cool but there is ZERO support in these shoes. I ended up giving them away because they hurt after about an hour. Think Converse zero support. It's like wearing a board. Looks cool though; just have pretty fit feet.
customer_reviews.author: snakelegs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but they run big
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but they run big. I purchased a size 6, based on other reviews, and because I usually wear a 6 in sneakers (with socks), but a 5.5 would have fit better (I wear size 5.5 in shoes). Ah well.
customer_reviews.author: Verin

customer_reviews.title: Color bled....
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why but the black bled on the white ... looked cheep... pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good seller, shoes came early. I have always liked Puma's and these were as described
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Total Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Well worth being waitlisting. Comfortable and attractive. -
customer_reviews.author: JAyT

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: The shape and the fit of this shoe is great but the color is off with the stripe and the sole
customer_reviews.author: Linnea

customer_reviews.title: Best.
customer_reviews.text: I love pumas and this style is my fav! Comfortable for all day, any day wear and the wine color is 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Just as the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes! So comfortable! My daily go to shoes. It feels great when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D'Costa

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These shoes change prices frequently. Make sure you get the lowest price
customer_reviews.author: Teneshagray

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: These may be a little wide for those with narrow feet but for my wide-but-not-wide-enough-to-buy-wide-width-shoes feet they fit well. Suede looks and feels like decent quality
customer_reviews.author: Nadster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color and comes with a spare set of colored ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color and comes with a spare set of colored laces. Only 4 stars because they fit small compared to another pair of Puma Classics in have in gold leather . Returned for 1/2 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm size 6 and I ordered a 6 1/2
customer_reviews.text: I'm size 6 and I ordered a 6 1/2. The sneakers are so cute and high quality. You need to up a half up.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla R.

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: If you need a wider toebox, these shoes aren't for you. I had to return them because they are just too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking in sand or grass because they have no arch support of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I am on a rose gold kick, and these sneakers were the only pair I can find that had some rose gold without being gaudy or pricey. The shoe came in excellent packaging. These shoes are traditional looking Pumas, and it comes with two sets of laces (white and peach). The peach color is closer to a nude next to my olive skin tone, and I love it. The design detail on the back is awesome and subtle.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: a great throwback shoe
customer_reviews.text: Color a bit darker blue than anticipated, but, overall, a great throwback shoe. Plan to order more at some point. Fit is great--I wear a pretty standard size 8 and that's what I ordered. No complaints on this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These stop traffic
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these! I've gotten quite a few compliments on them too. They are very soft and comfortable. The color contrary is neutral Edith just the right amount of feminine. I ordered a size bigger bc that's how I do things and they are roomy which I like. I'm probably going to buy another pair without pink on them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.text: These are wayyyyy more comfortable than I imagined they'd be. They're a little chunky looking but they go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Peahat

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE everything about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about these shoes. The only downside is they are a little narrow for my feet, but I have pretty wide feet. Hoping they will stretch a little as I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: A hopeless romantic

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These pumas fit perfect. Most comfortable shoes ever. I love the color and get compliments when I wear them. I will probably buy them in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Best addition to any outfit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I've had them for well over a year now and they are still just as perfect! The color is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt reedy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sizing!
customer_reviews.text: So cute but why does a women’s shoe come in men’s sizes? They aren’t equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Star Flores

customer_reviews.title: Could have gone a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but I could have gotten a 7.5 instead of 8.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie007

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. I use arch supports because they are quite flat.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Ratchet

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not what expected..
customer_reviews.text: Wish the color was how you see it here online (I checked other computers and phones and it's all the same color). I still like it, but now I need to buy clothes to actually match this darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Tarryn

customer_reviews.title: Great pair
customer_reviews.text: Have had Pumas in the past love the brand will rebuy from seller
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Del Prete

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color, too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the winetasting color & absolutely love the color!! Based on reviews, I ordered a larger size. They're too big. I'm rating 4 stars since the shoes are too big, but love the color. I'm ordering a smaller size. Can't wait to receive them!
customer_reviews.author: Monali

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true 7.5 and these fit perfectly- not too tight not too big. They look huge on my feet but maybe I'm just not used to wearing Pumas. Was skeptical after the sizing reviews but I don't have any qualms!
customer_reviews.author: josh and mandy

customer_reviews.title: Fast and authentic
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Product is exactly as advertised. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: 2020 just got worse
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong shoe color. It looks like a cheap knock off Puma shoe. Doesn’t look like the picture. Even the white color strip on the side of the shoe, looks an off white color. The inside of the right shoe feels like it’s seam was sewn too thick. Either that or it is glue I’m feeling, that rubs against my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, adorable and at a great price point. The elastic laces look like ribbon and never need to be tied
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vroomen

customer_reviews.title: Deceived.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted one month. It got a big "scar" and holes. I can't even tell my mom because I thought they were sturdy. I hope they will change the materials, really. I sew them so they last longer but now with that much thread, people can notice.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes! Reviews I read varied about getting a size up & i chose half a size larger than my regular size just to be sure. I would have been fine with my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are horrible. I am pretty sure they are knock offs. The quality is terrible and they run really big. The suede is all fuzzy not smooth like pairs I have purchased in the past. My daughter wore them 4 times and they have a huge hole in them. I have had many pairs of Pumas over the years and never had a problem like this with any of them!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on these shoes. The match perfectly to a sweatshirt hoodie that I wear. Love them!! So comfy. I want every color...lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Back of heel design is too high and rubs into the ankle area
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive, and well made shoe EXCEPT the back of the heel design comes up so incredibly far onto the ankle area it is painful when walking. The back digs into the skin just below the ankle bone. If the construction were softer, it might ease up in time, but this portion of the shoe is very firm.
customer_reviews.author: joy everett

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Puma shoes are extra comfortable and have great support. Also the price is great
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sneaker! Great color and comfy... I wear them all the time! Just a note- they are suede so make sure you waterproof before you wear them
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettMinx

customer_reviews.title: Try on somewhere then buy if you like!
customer_reviews.text: Slim fit. Write ups didn't reflect it. You pay shipping for return if under $60-70.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Bardsley

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sneaker & color for the summer
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd review also. I really like this sneaker & color for the summer. Nicely priced, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: V'Netta

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, pretty and stylish. The only downside is that it will get dirty really soon. Mine from 1 time wear it looks worn out for more 20 times. Runs a little bit larger which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Basmah

customer_reviews.title: super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: super cute and comfy. They feel a little smaller than a normal 8.5 that I wear, but they are getting more comfortable every day that I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bystrom

customer_reviews.title: Cute summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: This pink shoe is super cute! Fits perfectly and is comfortable to walk in. Can't wait to pair it with all kinds of outfits this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Camron&Natasha

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought my previous shoes were amazing, and these just blew them away. A great buy indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Chaim Pinchus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I only wish they came with a pair of white laces in addition to the back
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: ... third pair of the Suede Classics because I just love PUMAs. The first two times I stuck with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the Suede Classics because I just love PUMAs. The first two times I stuck with my usual size (6.5) and I felt ok wearing them. Visually, however, I did have a slight feeling of having clown shoes on. So THIS time I went with a 6 and this pair feels perfect. I feel enough support for my daily walk with the dog. Classic look overall. Would purchase again for sure. Great choice of colors.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Love but not for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: A little hot didn’t anticipate how thick the shoe is. Otherwise very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: expected it more comfortable. My foot is regular
customer_reviews.text: It hurts on the outside of the foot, expected it more comfortable.My foot is regular, and I always buy puma tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Fit is good. They look good on. I love the colour. Comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: So far they are awesome shoes! I wear a size 10 and they're ...
customer_reviews.text: So far they are awesome shoes! I wear a size 10 and they're true to size, super comfortable. The only thing I'm worried about is the color leak. My aunt got the same ones and the black started leaking into the white stripe. Gonna try out scotch guard and see if that'll keep it from leaking
customer_reviews.author: Karlee B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Puma is my favorite casual shoe. This is a beautiful sneaker - very, very comfortable. You almost forget your wearing it. I will be purchasing more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: AliciaA

customer_reviews.title: Great Retro Puma
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great retro Pumas. Remind me of high school. My only issue is they don't really have much arch support, but I will stick some insoles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gala Grant Kirk

customer_reviews.title: So so great
customer_reviews.text: I love Pumas and these are no exception. They have higher than normal quality shoelaces and the pattern on the leather is great. One of my favorite pairs!
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife. She wanted this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She wanted this shoes for the longest time, but she can’t find them in stores so it was a big surprise for her.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love these Pumas....they fit perfect and as expected. Very comfortable and lightweight as well. Will be ordering another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these in navy that I love so I decided to get another color. Very comfortable when you're on your feet a lot. I usually wear a 7 or 71/2. In these the 71/2 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and light on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Fresh, clean and bright. Just enough color to brighten your day. Comfortable fit and light on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Suede Classic Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Most well known of all the PUMA's shoes. Retro and always in style

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Lace-up sneaker with suede upper featuring signature Formstrip overlays and gold-tone branding at lateral side and counter
